description:
This course is designed to help you nail the opportunity of a lifetime. From interviews to promotions this course prepares you to take advantage of your next opportunity. Countless people have come to Chris for paid advice on how to further their careers from the skilled trades worker to College graduates and Entrepreneurs worth Millions. This first part series is going to give you the skills you need to be confident and prepared in any situation. 

Introduction: Entire Course Overview- The Expert's Interview academy is a series and this video will explain what is in the entire series itself. 

How To Convince Them In 90 Seconds- Many people fail to recognize that a decision maker makes a judgment call within minutes of you walking in the door for an interview. In this section you will learn how to seize the moment. 

Bonus Material:- These bonus videos will enhance your learning and give you ways to enhance your verbal cues and answers to the top ten reasons people fail.
title: Get Hired! Convince Them in 90 Seconds!
